Mod5_Description: Every {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds an enemy has been hit by {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, they are Immobilized for {c_number}{SF_18}{/c} |4second.:seconds.
Mod0_Description: Enemies deal {c_number}[{SF_28} * 100|%|]{/c} less damage while Burning from {c_important}Incinerate{/c}.
Mod1_Description: While channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, you Burn enemies around you for {c_number}[{SF_29} * 100|%|]{/c} of the damage per second.
name: Incinerate
